definition: medicine/drug/substance used for a specific purpose (e.g. poisoning, explosion, fermenting)/CL:種|种[zhong3],服[fu4],味[wei4]/to poison

sentences.english: My grandpa told me there was people coming for it each year.
sentences.chinese: 外公說，每年這裏都會有收藥材的人上山。

sentences.english: Objective To identify Umbelliferous fructification herbs.
sentences.chinese: 目的準確地鑑別傘形科果實類藥材。

sentences.english: Objective To establish a method for determination of the content of total coumarin in Chuanminshen viloaceum.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立川明參藥材中總香豆素含量測定方法。

sentences.english: Objective To establish the method for determining controlled contents of As, Pb and Hg in Chinese medicinal materials.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立測定中藥材中重金屬砷鉛汞的控制含量方法。

sentences.english: Yan not only, still tube tube sun grain and medicine.
sentences.chinese: 炎帝不僅管太陽，還管五穀和藥材。

sentences.english: Objective:To investigate the diversities of polysaccharides content of Dendrobium candidum and its test-tube culture.
sentences.chinese: 目的比較鐵皮石斛試管培養物與原藥材的多糖含量。

sentences.english: There is no wholesale market for Chinese herbal medicine in Shijiazhuang, where the specific location?
sentences.chinese: 石家莊有沒有中草藥材批發市場，具體地點在哪裏？

sentences.english: It is very costly to deliver medicine to Tibet by air.
sentences.chinese: 空運藥材進藏，成本很高。

sentences.english: Results The pharmacognostic character of Herba Agriophyllum was described comprehensively.
sentences.chinese: 結果詳細描述了蒙藥材沙蓬的生藥學特徵。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo study the effect of promoting blood circulation and removing blood stasis.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察抗血栓藥材水提物的活血化淤作用。

sentences.english: Jade harp in clay pot medicine was chopped du found, he recognized ShangChunTangs medicine.
sentences.chinese: 玉琴煲藥時被杜茸發現，他認出是尚春堂的藥材。

sentences.english: ConclusionThe fingerprint established can be used for quality control of Hainan Naucleae officinalis.
sentences.chinese: 結論所建立指紋圖譜可用於海南膽木藥材的質量控制。

sentences.english: Objective To establish the method of fingerprint analysis of Potentilla anserina by HPLC.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立蕨麻藥材HPLC指紋圖譜分析方法。

sentences.english: The hospital buys silkworms at a high price, from which they can make medicine.
sentences.chinese: 收購到的養蠶戶家中的殭蠶做成藥材。

sentences.english: RESULTS The HPLC fingerprint of the Fructus Tribulus terrestris L. was established preliminarily.
sentences.chinese: 結果初步建立了蒺藜藥材的指紋圖譜。

sentences.english: The company has a few hundred bases of natural herbs.
sentences.chinese: 公司擁有數百畝天然藥材基地。

definition: medicine/drug/substance used for a specific purpose (e.g. poisoning, explosion, fermenting)/CL:種|种[zhong3],服[fu4],味[wei4]/to poison
